settings.title: THE BRAND
settings.text:
Launched in 2016 by Geoffrey and Alex Ciantar, DUBAI is a luxury leather goods and jewelry label that explores the relationship between high end functionality and artisanal craftsmanship.

Designer Alex Ciantar studied the art of bag making in Florence under some of Italy’s leading leather workers and designers. Geoffrey worked under his father from a young age, and has designed collections for other leading brands in the industry. Inspired to carry on this enduring tradition, DUBAI practises traditional Italian expertise under ultramodern design sensibility.

With a design-led approach to luxury, DUBAI goes beyond fashion trends and offers timeless, exceptional pieces that complement a modern lifestyle. DUBAI encourages those who delve away from the limitations of fast fashion and run toward the openness and honesty of consciously produced products. Based on the southeast coast of the Persian Gulf, DUBAI heralds a slower approach to manufacturing and a strong commitment to sustainability.

With their first release of leather handbags and jewelry, DUBAI reconnects their customer with artisanship, quality and subtlety. The products' blank canvas-like quality encourages true freedom for the wearer’s own creativity and individualism. The DUBAI collector wears a bag, bracelet or ring, not as a sign of inclusion, but as a way of self-expression.

settings.subtitle: From our latest designs to our process, people and places behind them – explore what we’ve been up to and what’s yet to come.

settings.title: Where is the best place to store my leather bag?
settings.subtitle: Leather can be damaged by exposure to extreme heat, sunlight or moisture. Ideally you should keep your bag in a fabric dust bag and then store it in a cool, dry, dark place. Leave plenty of space around the bag and wrap buckles and zippers to prevent them marking the bag. You may wish to stuff the bag with acid free paper in order to maintain its shape.

settings.title: How do I clean my leather bag?
settings.subtitle:
Empty your bag and remove loose dirt with a soft brush, a lint roller or the brush attachment of a vacuum cleaner. Use either a specialist leather cleaner or a small quantity of warm soapy water and gently wipe the bag with a soft cloth. If you are using soapy water, towel dry the bag immediately. Never saturate leather with water and never apply chemical cleaners. Depending on the conditions to which it is exposed, leather will dry out over time and its fibres become brittle and crack. To prevent this, you need to replace the leather’s oils after cleaning.

Use a conditioner which is an emulsion of natural oils and waxes and which is easily absorbed into the leather. The application of beeswax will help waterproof the leather.

settings.title: Can leather bags be washed in a washing machine?
settings.subtitle: NO. Saturating leather causes it long term damage and will irrevocably shorten the life of the item. Cared for properly your leather bag should give a lifetime of service without ever needing to be submerged in water. If you do spill bright yellow curry all over your bag, you may feel that you have no alternative, but it is a last resort and your bag will never be the same again.

settings.title: Can leather bags get wet?
settings.subtitle: You should avoid getting a leather bag wet. A good quality leather bag will not be affected by a rain shower, but you should never allow your bag to become saturated with water. If your bag does become very wet you should stuff it with paper towel, not newspaper because the ink may mark the lining, and replace it as it becomes saturated. Dry the bag in warm conditions but do not use high heat such as a hairdryer or tumble dryer. When the bag is dry, replenish the oils which have been washed out by using a conditioner.

settings.title: Can I iron my leather bag?
settings.subtitle: Ironing a leather bag is possible, but it’s not a good idea. A crease or indentation will disappear over time with the application of conditioner but if you really can’t wait then proceed with extreme caution. Use the lowest setting on your iron, place brown paper or 100% cotton cloth over the leather and iron quickly and lightly. Condition the leather afterwards to replenish the oils it will have lost.

settings.title: How long will my leather bag last?
settings.subtitle: Our bags are made from good quality full grain leather with sturdy brass fittings and strong zips, which will last you a lifetime, if you look after it.

settings.title: Are Gold Casting Grains Gluten Free?
settings.subtitle:
There is no grain in gold. Gold casting grain is the fresh gold newly mixed with the alloy metals that strengthen the gold enough for jewelry making. This is the form they use in preparing for casting.

They use this size so it melts quickly, and because it is easy to measure out to track how much the jeweler needs.

settings.title: How do I remove a bangle that fits too tightly?
settings.subtitle: Massage lotion or oil into your hand and wrist. Make sure to relax your hand muscles. Now slide the bracelet off of your wrist while gently twisting the band.

settings.title: How do I determine my bracelet size?
settings.subtitle:
Step 1: Measure your wrist just below the wrist bone, where one would normally wear a bracelet, with a flexible measuring tape or a strip of paper.

Step 2: If you are using a plain strip of paper, then measure that paper strip with a ruler to determine your wrist size.

Step 3: Add 1/4 inch to 1 inch (average is 1/2 inch) to your wrist size, depending on whether you would like a snug, comfort, or loose fit. This is the ideal bracelet length for you.

settings.title: How can I change or cancel my order?
settings.subtitle: Due to technical restrictions, you are not able to change or cancel your order prior to delivery once it has been confirmed. If you would like to purchase a different item, or no longer wish to receive your order, please return the item you don't want within 30 days of receipt ( see return policy) and place a new order if desired. For further assistance, please contact our Customer Service Team.

settings.title: How long does it take for my order to arrive?
settings.subtitle: All orders ship from a central distribution center; therefore, shipping times differ slightly depending on the country in which you place your order.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we offer free shipping on all orders over $100 before tax.

settings.title: How much are shipping costs?
settings.subtitle: All orders ship from a central distribution center; therefore, shipping costs differ slightly from country to country.

settings.title: Can I order by phone?
settings.subtitle: Please place your order on our website. If you are having any problems our Customer Service teams can help during business hours.

settings.title: we collaborate with the best
settings.text: We are fortunate enough to call these people our neighbours and friends. They have welcomed us into the space we now call our home. We are the craftspeople of the southeast coast, sharing similar visions by creating beautiful, consciously produced products for the world we love.

settings.contact_subheading: do you have a Question about this product or any others?
settings.contact_content: Reach out today and get in touch! We're alway super happy to discuss our catalog and we keep close ties with all our suppliers, so we can definitely find whatever answers you may be seeking. We are closed on weekends but are happy to reply to your inquiries throughout the business week. Please allow 48 hours for a response.
